author: s1na
content: nothing against archiving this channel. just wanted to say <@!425343240212971521> and I are almost done with ssz-based code merkleization in geth and will soon have longer-range data on that

author: pipermerriam
content: <@!259648573401071617> current leading idea is to unify *everything* into a single Verkle trie, including the individual code chunks: https://notes.ethereum.org/@vbuterin/verkle_tree_structure

author: pipermerriam
content: So I *think* it is reasonable to expect code merklization to get swept up under the Verkle Trie migration

author: .vbuterin
content: This is the new link btw
